name: General Yakabaw: limits to power
description:
This is my first action platformer

Controls  - A and D button-  movements

                        S  Button -crouch

                       L button to fire (find the blaster first!)

                        space- to jump

General Yakabaw: Limits to Power

2022 Ironahand Games

Lorenzito Atangan MD , programmer / graphics

Many thanks to Emma M. Andersson, Matthew Pablo, Raayl  and Zander Noriega for

their awesome music!
